coverage_details.organ_transplant: SR 50,000.00 for organ harvesting in KSA only
coverage_details.optical: SR 2,000.00 (covers all ages, includes frames up to annual limit; functional vision correction covered if medically needed)
coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No Preauthorization required; No Medical adjudication required
coverage_details.special_instructions: Raw Data quarterly; Policy Performance quarterly; Performance Dashboard dynamic; Accept referrals from in-house clinic without pre-approval; Medical declaration not required for new members; Reimbursement claims accepted up to 180 days; Health lounge access; 4 Live Right activities; 1 Key account delegate; Room up to SAR 5,000; Cover companion charges in full; Artificial limbs covered if medically needed; Obesity Treatment SAR 20,000 with 20% deductible up to SAR 1,000; 10 cases of Mounjaro for obesity control; Emergency assistance services worldwide (outside KSA)
